ground_truth_reviews.comment: While this loop is functionally correct, it's not idiomatic Python. We should avoid manual index management with `range(len(...))` when we can iterate directly over the sequence. This improves readability and is less prone to potential off-by-one errors. Please refactor this to use a direct for-each loop: `for post_dict in _posts_db:`.

title: feat: Implement post retrieval logic
body: This commit adds the core service logic for fetching posts. It includes methods for getting a single post by its ID and for retrieving all posts.
